lead_paragraph: Bernardo Rezende might not be a household name like Michael Phelps, Usain Bolt or Rafael Nadal but in volleyball-mad Brazil the veteran coach cannot move around his native city without being stopped for autographs and selfies.

headline.main: Volleyball-Brazil Coach Looks to Add Home Gold to Stellar Career
headline.print_headline: Volleyball-Brazil Coach Looks to Add Home Gold to Stellar Career

snippet: Bernardo Rezende might not be a household name like Michael Phelps, Usain Bolt or Rafael Nadal but in volleyball-mad Brazil the veteran coach cannot move around his native city without being stopped for autographs and selfies....
